lead_paragraph: With a new streaming service aimed at broadening its customers base, the company says it can be “the Netflix of learning.”

headline.print_headline: Born in the VCR Era, Great Courses Seeks to Evolve
headline.main: Born in the VCR Era, Great Courses Seeks to Evolve

snippet: With a new streaming service aimed at broadening its customers base, the company says it can be “the Netflix of learning.”
abstract: Teaching Company hopes its Great Courses videotape and audio business will become 'Netflix of learning' following 2015 launch of e-learning streaming service; firm, which has $150 million annual revenue, says its popularity with people who seek intellectual stimulation without homework or exams gives it competitive edge over open online college courses.
